resources.string:
Spell a word using a genetic circuit.
 Each letter is a protein, but they're also activators! You're given promoters to express each letter.
 These promoters are special! They only work when previous letters have already been expressed.
You don\'t want your promoter to work too early and misspell your word.
Discovering your pathway through engineering biology.
Synbio Logic is designed as an educational introduction to genetic circuits through a logic puzzle.
Created by:\nMuayad, Carlos, Melanie, and Ryan (2019)
